page.title: Qualified Teams Prediction
page.lockedAlert: Predictions are locked for this tournament. You can view your predictions but cannot make changes.

instructions.title: How to make predictions:
instructions.dragTeams: Drag teams to change their position in the group
instructions.thirdPlace: For 3rd place: use the "Qualifies" checkbox to select which teams you predict will qualify

thirdPlace.title: Third Place Qualifiers
thirdPlace.overLimit: You've selected {selected} teams, but only {max} can qualify. Deselect {excess} team{excess, plural, =1 {} other {s}}.
thirdPlace.noSelection: You haven't selected any third place teams yet. Select teams from position 3 in each group to predict which will qualify.
